# setIntendedSpatialExperience(_:)

**Instance Method**

Sets the spatial audio experience your app intends to provide the user.

## Declaration

```swift
@nonobjc func setIntendedSpatialExperience(_ spatialExperience: any AVAudioSessionSpatialExperience) throws
```

## Discussion

- spatialExperience: The spatial audio experience to set.

## Configuring the spatial experience in visionOS

- **intendedSpatialExperience**: The spatial audio experience your app intends to provide the user.
- **AVAudioSessionSpatialExperience**
- **isNowPlayingCandidate**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the audio session is a candidate to be the Now Playing session.
- **setIsNowPlayingCandidate(_:)**: Sets a Boolean value that indicates whether the audio session is a candidate to be the Now Playing session.
